title: Dune
description: In the far future, young Paul Atreides and his family become embroiled in a battle for control of the desert planet Arrakis, the universe’s only source of the most valuable substance: spice. Paul’s destiny may change the fate of humanity.

title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
description: Spider-Man’s identity is revealed, putting his superhero responsibilities in conflict with his personal life. To fix it, he turns to Doctor Strange, but things spiral out of control as villains from other universes appear.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Neytiri struggle to protect their family from a new threat that seeks to exploit Pandora’s natural resources once again. As their bond with the water tribes deepens, they prepare for the battle to save their home.

title: John Wick: Chapter 4
description: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating the High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against new foes with powerful alliances across the globe, risking everything in the ultimate showdown.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than thirty years of service as a top aviator, Pete 'Maverick' Mitchell is still pushing the limits. But as he trains a new generation of pilots for a dangerous mission, he must confront his past and his deepest fears.

title: Oppenheimer
description: A look into the life of physicist J. Robert Oppenheimer as he navigates the development of the atomic bomb during World War II. The film delves into his moral struggles and the profound impact of his work on the world.

title: Barbie
description: In a vibrant and whimsical world, Barbie faces a crisis that leads her to question her existence. She embarks on a journey of self-discovery in both her fantasy world and the real world, learning what it truly means to be herself.

title: Mission: Impossible – Dead Reckoning Part One
description: Ethan Hunt and his team are tasked with stopping a powerful new enemy that threatens global security. With high-stakes action and relentless challenges, they face the ultimate test of loyalty and trust.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: Following King T'Challa's death, the leaders of Wakanda fight to protect their nation from invading forces, while grappling with their grief and finding a new path forward. A powerful tale of resilience, legacy, and hope.

title: The Batman
description: In his second year of fighting crime, Batman uncovers a web of corruption in Gotham City that ties back to his own family while facing a dangerous serial killer known as The Riddler. A darker and grittier take on the iconic hero.
